attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition to oppose the development of a Kentucky Fried Chicken (KFC) 'Drive-Thru Restaurant on the site a former Graziers Arms public house, Weddington Rd, Nuneaton. The basis for the opposition are, amongst others; LOCATION - only 22 metres from the nearest residential dwelling.
NEED - there is already a KFC in Nuneaton, and 2 more in close proximity.
ENVIRONMENT - located in an Air Quality Management Area.
Please do not allow this development.
